abstract: Experience suggests that the economic benefits of what is known as “congestion pricing” are substantial.
snippet: Experience suggests that the economic benefits of what is known as “congestion pricing” are substantial.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg recently proposed charging a fee to motorists who enter Manhattan south of 86th Street on weekdays. Drivers of cars would face a daily charge of $8 from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m., while the fee would be $21 for driving commercial trucks.

headline.main: A Sensible Solution to Thin Traffic, and One for Easing Concerns About Fairness
headline.print_headline: A Sensible Solution to Thin Traffic, and One for Easing Concerns About Fairness
